question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter • give contact details for when you are away • give instructions about how to care for your pet • describe other household duties
text: How are you? Hope my letter finds you well.

First of all, I just want to let you know that I am very happy that you say yes to staying in my humble home while I am on my annual leave. You can contact me anytime through my email, or/and through my mobile number.

I know you are already familiar with Milo, my beautiful dog. Please feed him twice a day and take him outside every morning for a walk. She will love it. Also, please water my plants inside my living room. There is  money at the top of the fridge, just in case you need to buy something. Another thing, I have expected one delivery from Amazon this coming Saturday, thus, could you please get it for me?
Thank you so much my dearest friend. See you when I come back. I will bring delicious peanuts for you.
